SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT EmailSendFailureID,EmailID,EmailBccAccountID,EmailAccountID,EmailSendFailureSendTime,Result FROM emailsendfailure WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND Result=@@Result@@%>;

SELECT EmailSendFailureID,EmailID,EmailBccAccountID,EmailAccountID,EmailSendFailureSendTime,Result FROM emailsendfailure WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND Result=@@Result@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailsendfailure WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND Result=@@Result@@%>;
